explains: adj. 肉的；肉质的；丰满的

sentences.en: It seems like magic that a fleshy lump of gray, disgusting meat can give rise to these feelings.
sentences.cn: 一个灰色的肉质块，恶心的肉，能引起这些感觉，这就像魔法一样。

sentences.en: He was well-built, but too fleshy to be impressive.
sentences.cn: 他肌肉发达，但是有点胖，没给人留下印象。

sentences.en: The standard epicurism person lets a person "fleshy mound".
sentences.cn: 那个标准的贪口福者让人感到“都是肉”。
